explanation: Many comments indicate bullish sentiment, references to breakouts on 4hr and daily timeframes, scalping opportunities, and multiple confirmations of upward momentum. Resistance around 108k is noted but not expected to hold for long. Several users mention BTC trending up, retesting zones, and dominance suggesting a coming pump. Despite some volatility and short-term confusion, overall sentiment and technical references are bullish.
